name: Resurrection Ritual
description:
This prototype was completed for a Game-A-Week class where we have to complete a game on a specific topic/ theme within the week! 

This week's theme was: Ritual (Week 3)

How to:

WASD - move

Mouse - look around

E - interact with objects

Esc to exit game

Find objects within the environment to complete the resurrection ritual. (Game is over when you cast the spell. VERY SHORT GAME)

Source:

[ALL SOUNDS USED ARE ROYALTY FREE]
